channel.title: Comments on: Kuri on the Today Show
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: I can't wait to get Kuri, since I was a kid I've always wanted a robot and it looks like I'm finally going to get one.
item.content:encoded: I can’t wait to get Kuri, since I was a kid I’ve always wanted a robot and it looks like I’m finally going to get one.

item.title: By: Tracy
item.dc:creator: Tracy
item.description: I can't wait my very own Kuri! You guys are doing a great job!
item.content:encoded: I can’t wait my very own Kuri! You guys are doing a great job!
